ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: with the exception of the family of Lut, all of whom We will save,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except the family of Lot whom we shall save
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: excepting the household of Lot. We shall deliver all of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Only the family of Lot will all be saved,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Except the family of Lut; we shall rescue all of them.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (All) except the family of Lut, all of whom we are to save (from the destruction)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except Lut's followers: We will most surely deliver them all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: excepting the folk of Lot; them we shall deliver

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Except for Lot's household, all of whom we shall rescue,

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Except Lot's family, of whom we shall save all,
